title: Intriguing Crypto Move: World Liberty Financial Transfers 200M WLFI in DeFi Token Test
body: In the fast-paced world of cryptocurrency, large token movements often trigger waves of speculation and curiosity. Recently, a significant transaction involving World Liberty Financial (WLFI), a DeFi project linked to the Trump family, has caught the attention of crypto enthusiasts and analysts alike. Nearly 200 million WLFI tokens were transferred to an unknown address, prompting questions about the project’s intentions and future trajectory. Let’s dive into the details of this intriguing crypto transaction and explore what it might signify for World Liberty Financial and the broader DeFi landscape. Decoding the Massive WLFI Token Transfer Data from Etherscan, a leading blockchain explorer, reveals that approximately 199.99 million WLFI tokens were moved from one address to another in a single transaction. This substantial amount, executed roughly five hours prior to reports, immediately raised eyebrows within the crypto community. According to Odaily, a prominent crypto news outlet, the most plausible explanation for this large-scale movement is a test of the token’s transfer functionality. But what does this mean, and why is it noteworthy? Let’s break down the key aspects of this WLFI token transfer : Scale of the Transaction: Moving nearly 200 million tokens is not a trivial matter. It indicates a significant internal operation within the World Liberty Financial ecosystem. Potential Test Scenario: The reported rationale of testing transfer functionality suggests a proactive approach to ensure the smooth operation of the WLFI token. This is crucial for any DeFi project aiming for scalability and reliability. Etherscan Visibility: The transaction’s visibility on Etherscan provides transparency and allows for public scrutiny, a hallmark of blockchain technology. Odaily Report: The reputable reporting from Odaily adds credibility to the interpretation of the transaction as a functional test. To better understand the context, consider this table summarizing the key transaction details: Metric Value Token WLFI (World Liberty Financial) Amount Transferred Approximately 199.99 million Reported Purpose Transfer Functionality Test Data Source Etherscan, Odaily Why Conduct a DeFi Token Test? Unveiling the Purpose For projects operating in the decentralized finance (DeFi) space, ensuring the robust functionality of their tokens is paramount. A DeFi token test , like the one potentially conducted by World Liberty Financial, serves several critical purposes: Functionality Verification: The primary goal is to confirm that the token can be transferred correctly and efficiently between different addresses. This is fundamental for user transactions, exchange listings, and overall platform usability. Smart Contract Audit: While not explicitly stated, such tests can indirectly validate the underlying smart contracts governing the token. Any issues during transfer could indicate potential vulnerabilities in the smart contract code. Scalability Assessment: Testing with large volumes of tokens, as seen in this case, can help assess the network’s capacity to handle significant transaction loads. This is crucial for future growth and adoption. Security Assurance: Identifying and resolving any transfer-related issues proactively enhances the security and reliability of the entire DeFi ecosystem built around the token. Preparation for Future Operations: Successful transfer tests pave the way for more complex operations, such as token distribution, staking mechanisms, or integration with other DeFi protocols. In essence, a token test is a crucial step in the lifecycle of a DeFi project, ensuring its operational readiness and building confidence among users and investors. The Trump Crypto Connection: Amplifying Scrutiny on the DeFi Project World Liberty Financial gains additional notoriety due to its association with the Trump family. This connection, whether direct or indirect, inevitably brings increased attention and scrutiny to the DeFi project . In the crypto world, where reputation and trust are vital, such affiliations can be a double-edged sword. Here’s how the Trump connection might influence perceptions: Heightened Visibility: The Trump name is globally recognized, instantly boosting the project’s visibility, especially in mainstream media and among politically engaged individuals. Polarizing Opinions: Depending on individual political views, the Trump association can either attract or repel potential users and investors. This polarization is a unique factor for WLFI compared to other DeFi projects. Increased Scrutiny: Projects linked to prominent public figures often face intense scrutiny from regulators, media watchdogs, and the public. Every action, including token transfers, is likely to be analyzed under a microscope. Marketing Advantage (Potentially): For certain segments of the population, the Trump connection might be seen as a positive endorsement, potentially attracting users who are supporters of the Trump family. Reputational Risk: Conversely, any negative publicity or controversy surrounding the Trump family could reflect negatively on World Liberty Financial and its token. Therefore, while the Trump connection provides a unique backdrop, World Liberty Financial must prioritize transparency, security, and functionality to succeed in the competitive DeFi landscape, regardless of its political associations. Navigating the DeFi Landscape: Potential and Challenges for WLFI World Liberty Financial, like any DeFi project , operates within a dynamic and evolving ecosystem. The potential for growth and innovation is immense, but it also faces significant challenges. Understanding both aspects is crucial for assessing the long-term prospects of WLFI and similar ventures. Potential Benefits: Decentralized Finance Access: DeFi aims to democratize financial services, offering alternatives to traditional banking and investment systems. WLFI could potentially provide access to these services to a broader audience. Innovation and Disruption: DeFi projects are at the forefront of financial innovation, exploring new models for lending, borrowing, trading, and asset management. WLFI could contribute to this innovation wave. Community-Driven Governance: Many DeFi projects embrace community governance, empowering token holders to participate in decision-making processes. This can foster a more inclusive and transparent ecosystem. Global Reach: Cryptocurrency and DeFi are inherently global, allowing projects like WLFI to reach users worldwide, bypassing geographical limitations of traditional finance. Potential for High Growth: The DeFi sector has demonstrated rapid growth, and successful projects can experience significant value appreciation and adoption. Challenges and Risks: Regulatory Uncertainty: The regulatory landscape for DeFi is still evolving globally. Unclear or unfavorable regulations could pose significant challenges to projects like WLFI. Security Vulnerabilities: DeFi platforms are susceptible to smart contract exploits and hacks. Security breaches can lead to substantial financial losses and reputational damage. Market Volatility: The cryptocurrency market is known for its volatility. Token prices can fluctuate dramatically, impacting the value and stability of DeFi projects. Complexity and User Experience: DeFi can be complex for average users to understand and navigate. Improving user experience is crucial for wider adoption. Competition: The DeFi space is becoming increasingly competitive, with numerous projects vying for users and market share. WLFI needs to differentiate itself to stand out. Conclusion: A Test with Potential Implications The crypto transaction involving nearly 200 million WLFI tokens serves as a reminder of the constant activity and developments within the cryptocurrency world. While officially reported as a transfer functionality test, such large-scale movements always spark curiosity and raise questions about the underlying strategy. For World Liberty Financial, navigating the intersection of DeFi innovation, political connections, and market dynamics will be crucial for its future success. The crypto community will be watching closely to see what the next move is for this intriguing project. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum price action.

title: Trump is driving Asia to diversify away from US
body: President Donald Trump’s economic policies and “America first” statements are changing Asia’s approach to trade and investment. Financiers and officials across the region are seeking to reduce their reliance on the United States in fear of a trade war. Since the end of World War II in 1945, the US has arguably been the most dominant country in global trade, supported by the dollar as the world’s reserve currency. According to some economists, Trump’s administration has disrupted that order with tariff policies , challenges to multilateral institutions, and a relationship with foreign countries that’s more transactional than not. Trump’s push to place the US’s needs first has left Asian markets looking for what some are calling an “America plus 1” strategy, diversifying away west-bound equities and the dollar. Asia is searching for alternatives Interviews with senior bankers, investors, and officials in Asia, cited by Reuters, suggest that discussions about reducing US dependence have grown significantly in recent months. However, Asian investors have yet to jump on any alternatives, and some believe that finding one is next to impossible. Ben Hung, President of International at Standard Chartered, coined the change in sentiment as a “once-in-100-year shift,” with the world becoming increasingly multipolar, led by the United States, China, and India. “ The post-World War II order has changed, ” Hung added. Citi reported a surge in inquiries from Asian clients trying to find some form of balance at a time when there’s heightened geopolitical uncertainty. The bank has seen double-digit growth in trade flows between Asia and emerging markets such as the Middle East and Latin America. Still, even with calls and prospects for more diversification, investments in the United States continue to rise. In a recent press briefing, White House spokesperson Kush Desai pointed to recent foreign investment commitments in the US as evidence that Trump’s economic policies are still lucrative in the eyes of foreign investors. Desai mentioned Taiwanese chipmaker TSMC and Dubai-based property developer DAMAC as examples of companies responding positively to Trump’s “America First” agenda of tariffs, deregulation, and the prospect of the country’s energy expansion. China’s trade relations with the U.S. Communication between Beijing and Washington hasn’t reached the levels it was before Trump’s inauguration, and is now more “sporadic” and undefined. Official records show only a few high-profile talking sessions, including China’s top diplomat, Wang Yi’s meeting with US Secretary of State Marco Rubio in late January, and Vice Premier He Lifeng speaking with Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent last month. Chinese officials undoubtedly want to understand what Trump wants before starting any trade negotiations. The Asian country could also have a list of priorities, including the removal of US tariffs, easing restrictions on Chinese investments and technology imports and exports, including Nvidia Chips, and assurances regarding Taiwan. For now, Beijing is responding to Trump’s tariffs with countermeasures designed to impose economic costs on the US. A Chinese official stated that China would “fight to the end” in a “tariff war, trade war, or any other war” with the United States. US markets resilient with no other opportunities in sight According to Standard Chartered’s survey, US assets are still attractive due to the strength of its economy, the depth of its capital markets, and the resilience of its institutions. For those looking to move away from the dollar, options are rather limited. The most feasible alternatives, gold, cryptocurrencies, and the Chinese yuan, come with drawbacks. Ben Hung noted that companies looking to transact in yuan face hurdles, particularly the need to hedge exposure to currency fluctuations. “ None of those three are perfect ,” he told Reuters. Yet, there is one available option; the Hong Kong Exchange’s Swap Connect , which allows investors to trade renminbi interest rate swaps to manage interest rate risk. Swap Connect’s daily turnover surged from 3 billion yuan when it launched in 2023 to 14.9 billion yuan last year. However, several banking executives said that hedging to manage yuan exposure is more marginal compared to dollar-denominated transactions. As reported by Cryptopolitan on Wednesday, Trump does not want to play a hand in any strengthening ties between China and Russia. Speaking to Fox News after a call with Russian President Vladimir Putin, Trump said: “ As a student of history, which I am—I’ve watched it all—the first thing you learn is you don’t want Russia and China to get together. ” 🇨🇳🇺🇸🇷🇺 China and Russia want to get along with the United States. We are respected now,Trump declared. Trump always feels good about himself.🥱 pic.twitter.com/xKXvMFR8le — 𝘊𝘰𝘳𝘳𝘪𝘯𝘦 (@OopsGuess) March 19, 2025 The US president told FOX that he has been in talks with China’s President Xi Jinping, adding that he would like America to be “friendly with both.” “ China needs us in terms of trade very badly, but we have to straighten out the deficit ,” Trump reckoned. Cryptopolitan Academy: Want to grow your money in 2025? Learn how to do it with DeFi in our upcoming webclass. Save Your Spot

title: Power Move: SoftBank’s $6.5B Acquisition of Ampere Ignites AI Semiconductor Revolution
body: In a bold and strategic move that is sending ripples through the tech world, SoftBank Group has announced its intent to acquire Ampere Computing, a leading-edge semiconductor designer, for a staggering $6.5 billion in an all-cash deal. This acquisition isn’t just about adding another company to SoftBank’s portfolio; it’s a powerful statement about the future of AI Infrastructure and SoftBank’s unwavering commitment to leading the charge in the artificial intelligence revolution. Why Ampere? Unpacking the Strategic Semiconductor Acquisition Ampere Computing, founded by industry veteran Renee James, is not just another chip designer. They are pioneers in developing high-performance, energy-efficient ARM-based server chips. This is crucial because: ARM Architecture Advantage: Ampere leverages the ARM architecture, known for its power efficiency and scalability. This is increasingly important for the massive computational demands of modern AI and cloud computing. Focus on AI and Cloud: Ampere’s chips are specifically designed for cloud-native computing and, more recently, sustainable AI compute. Their customer base includes giants like Google Cloud, Microsoft Azure, Oracle Cloud, Alibaba, and Tencent – a testament to their technology’s relevance and performance. Synergy with Arm Holdings: SoftBank already holds a significant stake in Arm Holdings. Ampere’s ARM-based chips create a natural synergy, potentially leading to tighter integration and collaborative innovation within SoftBank’s ecosystem. The acquisition of Ampere isn’t a spur-of-the-moment decision. SoftBank has been eyeing Ampere for a while, considering a minority stake back in 2021. Now, they are going all-in, recognizing the pivotal role semiconductors play in the burgeoning AI landscape. The $6.5 Billion Question: What Does SoftBank Gain? Spending $6.5 billion in cash is no small feat, even for a tech giant like SoftBank. So, what exactly are they buying? Beyond just acquiring a company, SoftBank is strategically bolstering its position in several key areas: Benefit Description AI Infrastructure Dominance Ampere’s technology directly enhances SoftBank’s capabilities in providing the foundational compute power needed for advanced AI and superintelligence. Accelerated Growth Initiatives The acquisition is expected to expedite SoftBank’s growth in the rapidly expanding AI market, providing a crucial technological advantage. Expanded AI Ecosystem Ampere complements SoftBank’s existing AI investments, such as its partnership with OpenAI and the Stargate data center project, creating a more comprehensive and powerful AI ecosystem. Strategic Asset in US Market Ampere, based in Silicon Valley, provides SoftBank with a stronger foothold in the crucial US technology market and access to top-tier semiconductor engineering talent. Masayoshi Son, Chairman and CEO of SoftBank Group Corp., succinctly captured the vision: “The future of Artificial Super Intelligence requires breakthrough computing power. Ampere’s expertise in semiconductors and high-performance computing will help accelerate this vision and deepens our commitment to AI innovation in the United States.” Ampere and ARM: A Powerful Partnership Under SoftBank’s Wing The connection between Ampere and Arm Holdings is a critical element of this acquisition. Let’s break down why this partnership is so significant: Shared Architecture: Both Ampere and Arm operate within the ARM ecosystem. Ampere’s server chips are built on the ARM compute platform, creating inherent compatibility and potential for optimized performance when working with Arm technologies. SoftBank’s Leverage: As the largest shareholder of Arm Holdings, SoftBank can potentially leverage this position to foster closer collaboration between Arm and Ampere. This could lead to co-engineered solutions and enhanced performance optimizations specifically tailored for AI workloads. Market Positioning: This alignment positions SoftBank uniquely in the market, controlling key components of the AI infrastructure stack – from chip design (Ampere) to the underlying architecture (Arm). This strategic alignment is not just about internal synergies. It’s about creating a powerful force in the AI semiconductor market, capable of competing with established giants and driving innovation forward. Beyond the Chips: SoftBank’s Broader AI Ambitions The Ampere acquisition is just the latest piece in SoftBank’s ambitious AI puzzle. Consider these recent moves: OpenAI Partnership: Collaboration to develop “Cristal intelligence,” an Advanced Enterprise AI solution. Stargate Project: Investment in a massive data center project for OpenAI in the US, providing the physical infrastructure for AI development. Sharp Factory Purchase: Acquisition of a factory in Japan, potentially for expanding AI-related manufacturing or data center capacity. These actions collectively paint a picture of SoftBank’s comprehensive strategy: to not just invest in AI companies, but to build and control the entire AI infrastructure ecosystem, from chips to data centers to advanced AI models. The acquisition of Ampere is a foundational element in this grand design. What’s Next for Ampere and the Semiconductor Landscape? The deal is expected to close in the second half of 2025, and Ampere will operate as a wholly-owned subsidiary of SoftBank. What can we expect in the future? Accelerated Innovation: With SoftBank’s backing and resources, Ampere is likely to accelerate its roadmap for high-performance ARM processors and AI-focused chips, potentially disrupting the market faster. Increased Competition: The strengthened Ampere, under SoftBank, will pose a greater competitive challenge to established semiconductor players, driving innovation and potentially lowering costs for AI compute. Ecosystem Expansion: We can anticipate further integration between Ampere, Arm, and other SoftBank portfolio companies, creating a more robust and interconnected AI technology ecosystem. Renee James, CEO of Ampere, expressed enthusiasm about the acquisition, stating, “With a shared vision for advancing AI, we are excited to join SoftBank Group and partner with its portfolio of leading technology companies… This is a fantastic outcome for our team, and we are excited to drive forward our AmpereOne roadmap for high-performance Arm processors and AI.” Conclusion: A Future Powered by AI Semiconductors SoftBank’s $6.5 billion acquisition of Ampere Computing is more than just a financial transaction; it’s a strategic investment in the very foundation of the future AI landscape. By bringing Ampere into its fold, SoftBank is not just acquiring a company, but securing a crucial piece of the puzzle in its ambitious vision for AI dominance. As AI infrastructure becomes increasingly critical, moves like this will define the leaders and laggards in the tech revolution. The semiconductor industry is heating up, and SoftBank is betting big on a future powered by AI, with Ampere at the heart of its computing engine. To learn more about the latest AI market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI institutional adoption.

title: Here’s Where Support & Resistance Lies For Solana, Based On On-Chain Data
body: The analytics firm Glassnode has revealed the Solana price levels that could be important to watch, based on on-chain accumulation data. Solana Cost Basis Distribution Reveals Where Supply Is Most Concentrated In a new post on X, Glassnode has discussed about the UTXO Realized Price Distribution (URPD) of Solana. The URPD is an indicator that basically tells us about how much of the SOL supply was purchased at which price levels. Naturally, the metric uses the last transaction price of any token in circulation as its cost basis. Related Reading: Bitcoin Transfer Count Lowest Since 2023—Is This Bearish? First, here is how the URPD looked when the cryptocurrency set its new all-time high (ATH) back in January: From the graph, it’s apparent that a few price levels like $144 stood out in terms of the amount of supply that they hosted. At the price levels closer to the new ATH, however, supply was quite thin, meaning not many coins changed hands there. In on-chain analysis, the potential of any level to act as support or resistance is measured in terms of the amount of supply that it hosts. This means that levels that have a large cluster around them on the URPD are the ones of importance to the asset. As for why this is so, the answer lies in investor psychology: holders are sensitive to retests of their cost basis. Whenever the price touches a large cost basis cluster, the investors who are holding these coins may respond by making some panic moves. These moves can tend toward buying if the retest is happening from above, as investors may want to defend their profit-loss boundary. In retests happening from below, however, the traders could react by selling instead, as they may seek to exit at their break-even. When SOL reached its ATH, there was a lack of support nearby. This may be why the asset ended up falling into the cluster that did carry a significant amount of supply. Below is a chart that shows how the URPD has changed following the price drawdown. From the graph, it’s visible that if SOL continues its downtrend, it may have to end up relying on the freshly grown $112 level. In January, this level hosted the cost basis of 4 million tokens, but today, the figure has grown to 9.7 million, equivalent to 1.67% of the entire supply. Beyond this level, Glassnode notes, “$94, $97, and $100 collectively hold nearly 21M SOL (3.5% of supply).” In the scenario that these support levels fail, Solana may find itself in trouble, as there aren’t any major supply clusters until $53. Related Reading: Dogecoin Shark & Whale Population Rises—Price Turnaround Incoming? In terms of the levels above, the $135 and $144 levels stand out, as they hold the acquisition level of 26.6 million and 27 million coins, respectively. These levels could act as major obstacles in SOL’s recovery. SOL Price Solana has jumped more than 5% over the last 24 hours to recover to the $130 level. Featured image from Shutterstock.com, Glassnode.com, chart from TradingView.com
tags: Solana|Sol|Solana Cost Basis Distribution|Solana On-Chain Data|Solana resistance|Solana Support|SOLUSDT

title: Explosive Bitcoin Bull Market Imminent? Analyst Predicts Massive Rally in 90 Days
body: Get ready for a potential seismic shift in the crypto world! A renowned crypto analyst is making waves with a bold prediction: a Bitcoin bull market could be just around the corner, possibly igniting within the next three months. Are you prepared for a potential surge in Bitcoin’s value? Let’s dive into the details of this exciting forecast and what it could mean for you. Why is a Bitcoin Bull Market Predicted Now? According to a recent report from Decrypt, Jamie Coutts, the chief crypto analyst at Real Vision, believes several key financial indicators are aligning to create the perfect storm for a Bitcoin bull market . Coutts points to historical patterns and recent economic adjustments as signals that should not be ignored. He suggests that these signals are eerily similar to those observed before previous major Bitcoin rallies. But what exactly are these signals? Historical Precedent: Coutts emphasizes that similar financial shifts in the past have consistently preceded significant upward movements in Bitcoin’s price. This historical context provides a compelling foundation for his current prediction. Global Liquidity Injections: A crucial factor highlighted by Coutts is the People’s Bank of China (PBOC) enhancing liquidity measures. Increased liquidity in major economies can often spill over into the crypto markets, providing fuel for asset appreciation. Market Underestimation: Coutts argues that the current market sentiment might be underestimating the speed and magnitude of a potential Bitcoin ascent. He believes Bitcoin could move much faster and higher than many anticipate. Crypto Analyst Jamie Coutts’ Bitcoin Price Rally Forecast Jamie Coutts, a respected voice in the crypto analysis sphere, isn’t just making a vague prediction. He’s pinpointing a timeframe. His analysis suggests that this Bitcoin price rally could materialize within the next 90 days. This isn’t just wishful thinking; it’s based on a deep dive into market dynamics and historical trends. Coutts’ expertise at Real Vision, a platform known for in-depth financial analysis, lends credibility to his forecast. But what are the potential targets for this rally? Coutts suggests that if these conditions play out as anticipated, Bitcoin could potentially reach new all-time highs before the end of the second quarter. This is a significant statement, implying a potentially rapid and substantial increase in value. For investors, this kind of forecast is a siren call, signaling a potential window of opportunity. Factors Fueling the Potential Bitcoin Forecast Several factors are aligning to potentially fuel this bullish Bitcoin forecast . Let’s break down some of the key elements that Coutts and other analysts are watching: PBOC Liquidity Measures: As mentioned, the People’s Bank of China’s moves to inject liquidity into the financial system are seen as a major catalyst. This increased liquidity can find its way into various asset classes, including cryptocurrencies. Institutional Investment: While not explicitly mentioned in the original article, broader trends indicate continued institutional interest and investment in Bitcoin. Major players entering or increasing their positions can significantly impact market dynamics. Halving Cycle Narrative: Although the next Bitcoin halving is still some time away, the historical pattern of price appreciation following halving events is always in the background, influencing long-term bullish sentiment. Technical Indicators: Beyond fundamental analysis, technical analysts are likely observing chart patterns and indicators that may also suggest an impending bullish phase for Bitcoin. Navigating Bitcoin News and Market Concerns Despite the optimistic Bitcoin news and bullish predictions, it’s crucial to remain grounded and acknowledge the potential headwinds. The crypto market is known for its volatility, and external factors can quickly shift the landscape. Coutts himself acknowledges potential risks, including: Trump’s Tariff Policy: The article mentions concerns over U.S. President Donald Trump’s tariff policy. Trade tensions and protectionist measures can introduce uncertainty and negatively impact global markets, including crypto. Recession Risk: Broader economic concerns, such as the risk of a recession, always loom in the background. Economic downturns can lead to risk-off sentiment, potentially impacting even assets like Bitcoin. Regulatory Uncertainty: The regulatory environment for cryptocurrencies remains in flux globally. Unexpected regulatory changes can create significant market volatility. It’s important to remember that no prediction is guaranteed. The crypto market is influenced by a complex interplay of factors, and surprises are always possible. Therefore, while Coutts’ forecast is compelling, it should be considered as one perspective among many. Actionable Insights: Preparing for a Potential Bitcoin Bull Market So, what should you do with this information? Here are some actionable insights to consider as you navigate this potential Bitcoin bull market scenario: Do Your Own Research (DYOR): Never rely solely on one analyst’s prediction. Conduct thorough research, explore different viewpoints, and understand the underlying factors driving market movements. Review Your Portfolio: Assess your current crypto portfolio and risk tolerance. Is your portfolio positioned to benefit from a potential bull market? Consider rebalancing if necessary. Stay Informed: Keep a close watch on market news, economic indicators, and regulatory developments. Being informed allows you to react quickly to changing conditions. Manage Risk: Cryptocurrencies are volatile assets. Never invest more than you can afford to lose. Implement risk management strategies such as diversification and stop-loss orders. Consider Gradual Accumulation: Instead of trying to time the market perfectly, consider a strategy of gradual accumulation (dollar-cost averaging) if you believe in the long-term potential of Bitcoin. Conclusion: Is Bitcoin on the Verge of a Meteoric Rise? Jamie Coutts’ prediction of a potential Bitcoin bull market within three months is certainly generating excitement and hope within the crypto community. Fueled by historical patterns and global liquidity injections, his analysis presents a compelling case for a significant Bitcoin price rally . While risks and uncertainties remain, the potential for substantial upside is undeniable. As always, informed decision-making, diligent research, and prudent risk management are paramount in the volatile world of cryptocurrency investment. Keep a close eye on market developments – the next 90 days could be transformative for Bitcoin. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: Unshaken Bitcoin Fundamentals: Expert Reassures Amid Market Volatility
body: The cryptocurrency market can feel like a rollercoaster, can’t it? One minute you’re soaring high on bullish momentum, the next you’re bracing for a sharp drop. Recently, Bitcoin (BTC) has seen its fair share of these dramatic price swings, leaving many investors wondering about the underlying health of the digital asset. But amidst the noise and fluctuating charts, a voice of reason has emerged from a key industry player, offering a reassuring perspective on Bitcoin’s core strength. What are Bitcoin Fundamentals and Why Do They Matter? When we talk about Bitcoin fundamentals , we’re essentially referring to the intrinsic properties that give Bitcoin its value and long-term potential. These aren’t just buzzwords; they are the foundational pillars upon which Bitcoin’s entire ecosystem is built. Think of it like the bedrock of a skyscraper – even if the upper floors sway in the wind (market volatility), the building remains structurally sound because of its strong base. Pierre Rochard, the Vice President of Research at Riot Platforms (RIOT), a prominent Bitcoin mining firm, recently took to X (formerly Twitter) to address the current market jitters. He stated unequivocally that despite the market volatility , Bitcoin’s core fundamentals remain “stable.” But what exactly are these fundamentals he’s referring to, and why should they give investors confidence? Let’s break down the key Bitcoin fundamentals that Rochard and other proponents consistently highlight: Limited Supply: Perhaps the most crucial fundamental is Bitcoin’s capped supply of 21 million coins. This scarcity is hardcoded into its protocol and cannot be changed. Unlike fiat currencies, which can be printed at will by central banks, Bitcoin’s scarcity acts as a natural hedge against inflation. This limited supply makes each Bitcoin potentially more valuable over time as demand increases or remains constant. Censorship Resistance: Bitcoin is designed to be decentralized and permissionless. This means no single entity, be it a government or corporation, can control or censor transactions. This censorship resistance is a powerful feature, particularly in regions with unstable political or financial systems. It ensures that individuals have control over their wealth and can transact freely. Global Accessibility: Anyone with an internet connection can participate in the Bitcoin network. It transcends geographical boundaries and traditional banking systems. This global accessibility opens up financial inclusion to billions of people worldwide who are unbanked or underbanked. It allows for faster and cheaper cross-border transactions compared to traditional methods. These core tenets are not affected by short-term price fluctuations. They are inherent to Bitcoin’s design and continue to operate regardless of whether the price is up or down. This is the essence of Rochard’s reassuring message: focus on the bedrock, not the waves crashing against the shore. Navigating Cryptocurrency Market Volatility: Expert Insights The cryptocurrency market is known for its volatility. It’s a relatively young and evolving asset class, subject to a range of factors that can trigger rapid price swings. These factors can include: Regulatory News: Announcements regarding government regulations or policy changes can significantly impact market sentiment. Macroeconomic Events: Global economic events, inflation rates, and interest rate decisions can influence investor behavior and risk appetite in the crypto market. Market Sentiment: Social media trends, news headlines, and overall investor psychology play a significant role in short-term price movements. Fear and greed can drive dramatic swings. Whale Activity: Large transactions by significant Bitcoin holders (whales) can sometimes trigger market fluctuations. It’s crucial to understand that these factors often contribute to temporary price volatility and don’t necessarily reflect a fundamental change in Bitcoin’s underlying technology or value proposition. Rochard’s statement serves as a reminder to zoom out from the daily price charts and consider the bigger picture. Think of it this way: imagine you’re investing in a tech company. The stock price might fluctuate based on quarterly earnings reports or industry news. However, if the company’s core technology is groundbreaking, its leadership is strong, and its long-term vision is sound, short-term price dips become less concerning. The same principle applies to BTC . Its underlying fundamentals are the “groundbreaking technology,” its decentralized nature is the “strong leadership” (or lack thereof, in a positive, decentralized sense), and its mission to be a censorship-resistant, global, digital currency is the “sound long-term vision.” BTC’s Limited Supply: A Cornerstone of its Fundamentals Let’s delve deeper into one of the most compelling fundamentals : Bitcoin’s limited supply. This scarcity is often compared to gold, a precious metal that has historically held value due to its finite nature. Just as there’s a limited amount of gold on Earth, there will only ever be 21 million Bitcoin. This scarcity is programmed into Bitcoin’s code and enforced by its decentralized network. The process of “mining” new Bitcoin becomes increasingly difficult over time, and the rate at which new coins are released into circulation halves approximately every four years (a phenomenon known as “halving”). This predictable and decreasing supply issuance further reinforces Bitcoin’s scarcity. In a world where fiat currencies are prone to inflation due to increased money supply, Bitcoin’s limited supply offers a contrasting narrative. Many investors view Bitcoin as a potential store of value, a digital asset that can hold its purchasing power over time, particularly in inflationary environments. This scarcity is a fundamental aspect that distinguishes Bitcoin from traditional financial assets and contributes to its long-term investment thesis. Censorship Resistance and Global Accessibility: Key Benefits of Bitcoin Beyond scarcity, Bitcoin boasts other critical benefits that solidify its fundamental value proposition. Censorship resistance is a cornerstone of Bitcoin’s design. Because the network is decentralized, no single authority can prevent transactions from being processed or control who can participate. This is a game-changer in regions where governments or financial institutions exert tight control over financial systems. Imagine individuals living under oppressive regimes or in countries with hyperinflation. Bitcoin offers them a potential escape route, a way to store and transact value outside the reach of centralized control. This censorship resistance is not just a technical feature; it’s a principle of financial freedom and empowerment. Coupled with censorship resistance is global accessibility . To participate in the traditional financial system, you often need a bank account, identification, and a physical address. Billions of people worldwide lack access to these basic requirements. Bitcoin, on the other hand, requires only an internet connection. Anyone, anywhere, can create a Bitcoin wallet and start transacting. This inclusivity has the potential to revolutionize financial access for underserved populations globally. These benefits – censorship resistance and global accessibility – are not fleeting trends; they are inherent characteristics of Bitcoin that address fundamental challenges in the traditional financial world. They are part of the reason why many believe Bitcoin has the potential to be a transformative technology in the long run. Challenges and Opportunities in the Bitcoin Market While Bitcoin’s fundamentals remain robust, it’s important to acknowledge the challenges and opportunities that exist within the Bitcoin market . The price volatility, while often unsettling, also presents opportunities for traders and investors. Those with a long-term perspective can view price dips as buying opportunities, accumulating Bitcoin at lower prices, believing in its long-term value proposition. However, the volatility also underscores the importance of risk management and due diligence. Investing in Bitcoin, like any asset, carries risks. It’s crucial to understand these risks, diversify your portfolio, and never invest more than you can afford to lose. Looking ahead, the Bitcoin market is likely to continue to evolve. Increased institutional adoption, regulatory clarity, and technological advancements (like the Lightning Network for faster and cheaper transactions) could further strengthen Bitcoin’s ecosystem and drive broader adoption. The journey of Bitcoin is far from over, and while volatility may be a constant companion, its core fundamentals provide a solid foundation for its future. Actionable Insights: Focus on Fundamentals: When market volatility strikes, shift your focus from short-term price charts to Bitcoin’s core fundamentals: limited supply, censorship resistance, and global accessibility. Long-Term Perspective: Bitcoin is a long-term game. Consider your investment horizon and avoid making emotional decisions based on short-term price swings. Due Diligence: Educate yourself about Bitcoin and the cryptocurrency market. Understand the risks and rewards before investing. Risk Management: Diversify your portfolio and only invest what you can afford to lose. Stay Informed: Keep up-to-date with developments in the cryptocurrency space, including regulatory news and technological advancements. Conclusion: Staying Grounded in Bitcoin’s Core Strength In the often-turbulent world of cryptocurrencies, it’s easy to get caught up in the daily price fluctuations and lose sight of the bigger picture. Pierre Rochard’s statement serves as a valuable reminder to stay grounded in Bitcoin’s core strength: its unshaken fundamentals. These fundamentals – limited supply, censorship resistance, and global accessibility – are not just talking points; they are the bedrock of Bitcoin’s value and long-term potential. While market volatility is likely to remain a feature of the cryptocurrency landscape, understanding and appreciating Bitcoin’s underlying principles can provide investors with the confidence to navigate the ups and downs and recognize the enduring value proposition of this groundbreaking digital asset. Don’t let the noise of short-term price action drown out the signal of Bitcoin’s fundamental strength. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: BTC Unlikely to Hit $77K as Fed Signals End of Quantitative Tightening
body: Market sentiment also improved, with analysts like Jamie Coutts and Mark Moss agreeing that the Fed’s policies could further boost Bitcoin. Meanwhile, ARK Invest CEO Cathie Wood recently warned of a potential US recession, and argued that slowing economic activity may push policymakers toward pro-growth measures that could benefit digital assets. BlackRock’s head of digital assets, Robbie Mitchnick, supports Bitcoin’s resilience in a downturn, due to its potential as a hedge against rising fiscal spending and economic uncertainty, though Coinbase analysts are still skeptical about the crypto market’s near-term prospects. Arthur Hayes Says Bitcoin has Likely Bottomed Bitcoin’s ability to revisit the $77,000 price level seems increasingly unlikely, according to BitMEX co-founder Arthur Hayes. After the Federal Reserve’s latest announcement on March 19, Hayes suggested that quantitative tightening (QT) is “basically over,” which signals potential support for risk assets like Bitcoin. The Fed revealed plans to slow its securities sell-off by cutting the monthly Treasury cap from $25 billion to $5 billion starting in April , a move that could ease liquidity pressures in financial markets. On March 10, Bitcoin briefly dipped to $77,000, which was its lowest point since November. Hayes questioned whether that was the bottom, and ended up concluding that it was probable. He also pointed out that a bigger bullish catalyst will be a reinstatement of the Supplementary Leverage Ratio (SLR) exemption or a return to quantitative easing (QE). The SLR exemption, which was introduced during the COVID-19 pandemic, allowed banks to exclude US Treasury securities from leverage calculations, while QE is designed to stimulate economic growth through asset purchases. Bitcoin price action over the past month (Source: CoinMarketCap ) Real Vision chief crypto analyst Jamie Coutts agreed with Hayes’ view, and stated that QT is effectively dead. He stated that treasury volatility has calmed after a decline in the US dollar earlier this month, which is an indicator of improving liquidity conditions. Other market observers, like Axie Infinity co-founder Jeff “JiHo” Zirlin , described the Fed’s policy shift as a positive development for both crypto and equities, and suggested that the central bank has room to ease financial conditions even more. Bitcoin venture capitalist Mark Moss predicted that “the dam is going to break” as QT comes to an end. Market sentiment already responded to the Fed’s stance. The Crypto Fear & Greed Index is a key measure of investor sentiment, and it shifted to a “Neutral” rating of 49 after spending weeks in “Fear” territory since late February. Despite Bitcoin being nearly 22% below its January all-time high of $109,000, Infinex founder Kain Warwick sees this as a standard mid-bull market correction rather than a sign of broader weakness. Warwick is very confident in Bitcoin’s four-year cycle and expects prices to continue grinding higher for the remainder of the year. Cathie Wood Warns of Recession Cathie Wood, the CEO of ARK Invest, believes that the White House is underestimating the risk of a recession in the United States, largely due to the impact of President Donald Trump’s tariff policies. At the Digital Asset Summit in New York on March 18, Wood shared her concerns that the velocity of money is slowing down dramatically, which is a signal that economic activity is weakening. Cathie Wood at the Digital Asset Summit While US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent downplayed the risk of a downturn, Wood has a different view, and suggested that a slowdown in capital movement could indicate declining GDP and ultimately push the government and Federal Reserve toward more pro-growth policies like tax cuts and monetary easing. Futures prices from CME Group show increasing confidence in multiple rate cuts during the second half of the year, reinforcing the idea that policymakers will move to support economic growth in response to weakening conditions. ARK Invest has maintained a long-term investment outlook, particularly in the cryptocurrency sector. The firm, in partnership with 21Shares, launched a spot Bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF) that was approved on Jan. 11 of 2024, and now holds more than $3.9 billion in net assets . Through a collaboration with Eaglebrook Advisors, ARK also offers crypto portfolio solutions to wealth managers. (Source: Farside Investors ) At the summit, Wood explained that long-term innovation is still the core of ARK’s investment philosophy despite recent market fluctuations. When asked about the viability of crypto as an investment, she pointed to the firm’s continued expansion beyond just Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Solana, which proves that the company is very confident in the broader blockchain ecosystem. The investment landscape for digital assets also benefited from improving regulatory conditions. Wood mentioned that pro-crypto policy shifts are giving institutions a lot more confidence to allocate capital to the space. She referenced ARK’s early research from 2016, which identified Bitcoin as the foundation of a new asset class, and observed that institutional investors, once skeptical, now recognize a fiduciary responsibility to provide clients with exposure to digital assets. Recession Could Boost Bitcoin BlackRock’s head of digital assets, Robbie Mitchnick, believes Bitcoin is poised to thrive in a recessionary macro environment, despite the skepticism from some analysts. In a March 19 interview with Yahoo Finance, Mitchnick explained that Bitcoin tends to benefit from increased fiscal spending, rising deficits, lower interest rates, and monetary stimulus, which are conditions that often accompany economic downturns. He also pointed out that fears of broader social disorder can act as a catalyst for Bitcoin, making it an attractive asset during uncertain times. While many still categorize Bitcoin as a risk-on asset that will suffer in a recession alongside equities and high-yield bonds, Mitchnick believes this classification is misguided. He thinks that the market has yet to fully grasp Bitcoin’s unique role in a changing financial landscape, seeing it as an opportunity for education in a still-nascent asset class. BlackRock has been working with clients to navigate these conflicting narratives , particularly as some of the firm’s long-term Bitcoin investors saw the recent market correction as a buying opportunity rather than a cause for concern. On the other hand, not all analysts share BlackRock’s bullish stance. Researchers at Coinbase suggested that the optimism surrounding crypto in the first quarter was misplaced due to fears of a severe US economic slowdown. In its March 17 monthly outlook, Coinbase Institutional pointed to concerns over recession risks and recent tariff policies as major factors that have weighed on market sentiment. Despite near-term uncertainties, BlackRock remains a driving force behind institutional Bitcoin adoption. The firm’s iShares Bitcoin Trust ETF holds $48.7 billion in net assets, making it the largest Bitcoin investment product in existence. Mitchnick downplayed the recent net outflows from spot Bitcoin ETFs, and attributed them to hedge funds unwinding their spot-futures arbitrage trades rather than a shift in sentiment among long-term holders.

title: Bitmex CEO Says Bitcoin’s Drop Is Over—Predicts Fed Rate Cuts Will Spark a Rally
body: The post Bitmex CEO Says Bitcoin’s Drop Is Over—Predicts Fed Rate Cuts Will Spark a Rally appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Bitcoin is making a strong comeback, jumping to $86k after the latest Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) meeting. But according to former BitMEX CEO Arthur Hayes, this is just the beginning. He predicts the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates on April 1, which could trigger a massive Bitcoin rally. Could BTC hit $90,000 next? Bitcoin’s Drop Is Over—Big Rally Ahead? Arthur Hayes believes Bitcoin’s recent dip to $77k was the bottom. He points to April 1 as a turning point, when the Fed is expected to stop its policy of quantitative tightening (QT). If that happens, more money could flow into the market, pushing Bitcoin higher. He also suggests that the U.S. stock market might keep falling, forcing the Fed to step in with policies that could help Bitcoin. Hayes’ advice? “Stay nimble and cashed up” because big moves are coming! Additionally, Crypto and stock traders have been predicting that the Fed will slow down its tightening policy. The FOMC minutes confirmed this, revealing that the Fed will cut its monthly Treasury sales limit from $25 billion to $5 billion. Bitcoin Eying $90K Next After the FOMC meeting, Bitcoin didn’t waste any time reacting to the Fed meeting . It jumped 3.5% to $87,000 and is now testing key resistance levels. Meanwhile, crypto analyst IncomeSharks noted that if BTC closes above $86,351, it could break out and start a major rally. Bitcoin bounced at supertrend support. Pretty amazing to see it still holding a buy signal too. Now to see what $BTC does at OBV resistance and diagonal resistance. Would be a clear sign of strength to see a follow through here. pic.twitter.com/h11gRdDwSt — IncomeSharks (@IncomeSharks) March 19, 2025 Another key factor is the rising M2 money supply, which has a strong link to Bitcoin’s price. Experts say even a small 10% increase in liquidity could more than double Bitcoin’s price. If this trend continues, BTC could hit $90,000 or even higher in April! Experts Disagree With Hayes’s Prediction While Hayes is confident that QT will end by April 1, not everyone agrees. Analyst Benjamin Cowen argues that QT is still ongoing, with the Fed reducing its balance sheet by $35 billion per month. Still, if the Fed does lower rates as Hayes predicts, Bitcoin could be in for a massive surge. With April just around the corner, all eyes are on the Fed next meeting.

title: Strategic Paycoin Move: Wallet Pay Suspension Signals Massive Store Coverage Expansion
body: In a significant move for the virtual asset payment landscape, Paycoin (PCI), a prominent crypto payment platform operated by South Korean blockchain innovator Danal Fintech, has announced a temporary suspension of its Wallet Pay service. This news, delivered via a recent Medium blog post, might initially raise eyebrows, but it signals a strategic pivot towards broader accessibility and enhanced user experience. Let’s delve into the details of this announcement and understand what it means for Paycoin users and the wider cryptocurrency community. What’s Happening with Paycoin Wallet Pay? The core announcement is straightforward: Paycoin will be temporarily suspending its Wallet Pay service starting March 21st at 15:00 UTC. For users accustomed to using Wallet Pay for their daily transactions, this might seem like a disruption. However, it’s crucial to understand the rationale behind this decision. This isn’t a step back, but rather a strategic pause to facilitate a significant leap forward. The suspension is temporary, paving the way for a more robust and widely accessible service in the near future. Here’s a quick breakdown of the key points: Temporary Suspension: Paycoin Wallet Pay will be suspended from March 21st, 15:00 UTC. Reason for Suspension: To facilitate expansion of store coverage and service enhancements. Future Plans: Re-launch in April with expanded support for major brand-affiliated stores. Operator: Paycoin (PCI) operated by Danal Fintech. Communication Channel: Announcement via Medium blog post. Think of it like renovating a popular store. To make the shopping experience even better and offer more products (in this case, more store options for using Paycoin), you need to temporarily close to restructure and upgrade. This is precisely what Paycoin is doing with its Wallet Pay service. Why Expand Store Coverage for Crypto Payment Platform? The decision to expand store coverage is a pivotal one for any crypto payment platform aiming for mainstream adoption. Currently, while Paycoin’s Wallet Pay is accepted at various locations, expanding its reach to include “additional major brand-affiliated stores” is a game-changer. But why is this expansion so critical? Increased Utility: More store coverage directly translates to increased utility for Paycoin holders. The more places users can spend their PCI cryptocurrency, the more valuable and practical it becomes in their daily lives. Enhanced User Experience: Imagine being able to use your Paycoin Wallet Pay at your favorite coffee shop, grocery store, or clothing retailer. Expanded coverage makes the payment process seamless and convenient, encouraging regular use. Driving Adoption: Wider acceptance is a key driver of cryptocurrency adoption. When people see they can actually use virtual asset payment options like Paycoin at places they already frequent, it demystifies crypto and makes it a tangible part of their financial routine. Competitive Edge: In the burgeoning crypto payment space, expanding store coverage is a competitive differentiator. It sets Paycoin apart by offering users a more practical and versatile payment solution compared to platforms with limited acceptance. Network Effects: As more stores join the Paycoin network, the platform becomes more attractive to both users and merchants, creating positive network effects that fuel further growth and adoption. Essentially, store coverage is the lifeline of a successful crypto payment platform . Without it, even the most technologically advanced platform remains limited in its real-world application. Paycoin’s focus on expansion demonstrates a clear understanding of this fundamental principle. The Benefits of Using Paycoin Wallet Pay for Virtual Asset Payment Even with the temporary suspension, it’s important to remember the core benefits that Paycoin Wallet Pay offers, and how this expansion will amplify them: Seamless Transactions: Wallet Pay aims to make crypto payments as smooth as traditional methods. Imagine paying with your smartphone in just a few taps using your PCI cryptocurrency. Lower Transaction Fees: Cryptocurrencies often boast lower transaction fees compared to traditional banking systems, which can be beneficial for both merchants and consumers. Faster Payments: Crypto transactions can be processed much faster than traditional bank transfers, especially for international transactions. Security and Transparency: Blockchain technology underpins Paycoin, offering enhanced security and transparency in transactions. Global Accessibility: While currently focused on South Korea and expanding store coverage there, the nature of cryptocurrency allows for potential global accessibility in the future. These benefits are not just theoretical; they translate to real advantages for users who embrace virtual asset payment methods like Paycoin. The expansion of store coverage will make these benefits even more accessible and impactful. Store Coverage Expansion: What Can We Expect in April? While the exact details of the “major brand-affiliated stores” joining the Paycoin Wallet Pay network are yet to be fully unveiled, the announcement hints at significant partnerships. We can anticipate collaborations with well-known and widely frequented retail chains. This could include: Major Retail Chains: Think department stores, electronics retailers, and large supermarkets. Food and Beverage Brands: Popular coffee chains, fast-food restaurants, and restaurant groups. Convenience Stores: Expanding into convenience store chains would drastically increase everyday usability. Entertainment and Leisure: Movie theaters, amusement parks, and other entertainment venues could be on the list. The inclusion of “brand-affiliated” stores suggests partnerships with established and reputable businesses, further legitimizing PCI cryptocurrency as a viable payment option. The April relaunch is eagerly anticipated, and Paycoin is likely to release more specific details closer to the date, generating excitement and anticipation within the crypto community and among potential new users. Navigating the Temporary Suspension of Paycoin Wallet Pay For existing Paycoin Wallet Pay users, the temporary suspension will require a slight adjustment. During this period, Wallet Pay will be unavailable for transactions. However, this is a short-term inconvenience for long-term gain. Here’s how users can navigate this period: Plan Ahead: Be aware of the suspension date (March 21st, 15:00 UTC) and make necessary adjustments to your payment methods for transactions during the suspension period. Stay Informed: Keep an eye on Paycoin’s official channels (Medium blog, social media, etc.) for updates and announcements regarding the expansion and relaunch in April. Explore Other PCI Features: Paycoin likely offers other features beyond Wallet Pay. Explore these to maximize your use of the PCI cryptocurrency during the suspension. Anticipate the Relaunch: Look forward to April and the expanded store coverage. This temporary suspension is a positive step towards a more versatile and widely accepted Paycoin ecosystem. It’s crucial to view this suspension in the context of growth and improvement. Paycoin is not diminishing its service; it’s strategically enhancing it to provide a superior experience for its users and to solidify its position in the competitive virtual asset payment market. The Future Looks Bright for Paycoin and PCI Cryptocurrency Paycoin’s decision to temporarily suspend Wallet Pay to facilitate a significant expansion of store coverage is a bold and strategic move. It underscores the company’s commitment to making PCI cryptocurrency a practical and widely used payment method. By focusing on expanding accessibility and enhancing user experience, Paycoin is positioning itself for continued growth and success in the evolving landscape of digital finance. The temporary suspension, while causing minor short-term inconvenience, is a necessary step towards realizing the full potential of Paycoin Wallet Pay . The promise of expanded store coverage in April is exciting news for users and the broader crypto community. As we await the relaunch, it’s clear that Paycoin is focused on building a robust and user-friendly crypto payment platform that can truly bridge the gap between digital assets and everyday commerce. This strategic move by Paycoin demonstrates a forward-thinking approach, prioritizing long-term growth and user value over short-term continuity. The April relaunch and expanded store network will be a significant milestone for Paycoin and a testament to the growing adoption of cryptocurrency in everyday life. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: $1 Dogecoin? Whale Accumulation Suggests A Rebound—Analyst
body: Crypto analysts predicted that Dogecoin could still reverse its current downward trend and propel itself to hit $1 per coin, a forecast that might increase investors’ optimism about the popular meme coin. Market experts said that Elon Musk’s favorite meme coin can bank on the increasing whale activity and a positive outlook from the Stochastic RSI analysis showing a potential upward price trajectory. Related Reading: XRP Turnaround Moment? Analyst Says It’s Lift-Off Time Optimism On The DOGE Dogecoin might not have been spared by the bearish market condition affecting the broader cryptocurrency space but despite the memecoin’s facing several short-term challenges, crypto analysts remain confident in the future of the token and predict a possible increase in its value. Data showed that DOGE slightly moved upward with a 2% increase in the past week but suffered a 36% price decline in its price in the broader picture, raising concern among its investors. As of writing, Dogecoin is traded at $0.1678, down by 0.5% in the past 24 hours, reflecting the overall negative market sentiment. However, the memecoin is still dominating the market with 0.92% with a market capitalization of nearly $25 billion and a 24-hour trading volume of more than $816 million. The short-term declines and challenges that DOGE is facing right now cannot overshadow the token’s long-term growth potential. Whale Activity On The Rise Analysts said that one of the primary drivers of optimism on DOGE is its large investors which are registering positive activity that could fuel the growth of the memecoin in the upcoming months. Market observers revealed that whale activity has increased over the past week with over 110 million DOGE tokens acquired by large investors. These investors are betting that the meme token might be ripe for a possible breakout, highlighting the confidence of whales in the token’s long-term growth. It is also an indicator that whales are not looking at the coin’s short-term volatility but on its long-run prospects. #Dogecoin Stochastic RSI suggests $DOGE could stop its downtrend here and aim for the $1 mark 🔥$Doge pic.twitter.com/gkpayjUoTc — Trader Tardigrade (@TATrader_Alan) March 18, 2025 Can Dogecoin Hit $1? Meanwhile, a crypto analyst believed that Dogecoin could hit $1 per coin, sparking the interest of traders in the memecoin. Trader Tardigrade said in a post that projections using the Stochastic RSI show a bright future for the meme crypto, suggesting that it can recover from the short-term declines leading to a price surge. Related Reading: XRP Vs. ETH: Bold Prediction Claims ‘Dying’ Ethereum’s Reign Is Ending “#Dogecoin Stochastic RSI suggests $DOGE could stop its downtrend here and aim for the $1 mark,” Trader Tardigrade noted. The key indicator suggested that DOGE could reverse its downtrend and catapult it to upward price movement, something which is also driving optimism among investors. The Stochastic RSI is a gauge being used to spot trend reversals, which is now giving hope to those betting on Dogecoin’s resurgence. Featured image from Gemini Imagen, chart from TradingView

title: Bitcoin Is About to Explode. Here’s Why
body: Ash Crypto recently pointed out a notable decline in USDT dominance, signaling a potential breakout for Bitcoin . This shift suggests that investors are moving capital from stablecoins back into BTC, a pattern that has historically preceded bullish price action. What Is USDT Dominance and Why Does It Matter? USDT dominance refers to Tether’s share of the total cryptocurrency market. When this percentage rises, it often means traders are seeking safety in stablecoins, signaling fear or uncertainty. However, when USDT dominance falls, it indicates that investors are reallocating funds to riskier assets like Bitcoin, a classic sign of growing market confidence. Why Bitcoin Could Be on the Verge of a Rally The recent drop in USDT dominance suggests that more money is flowing into Bitcoin, increasing buying pressure and pushing prices higher. Historical trends show that when this shift occurs, BTC tends to surge in value . USDT DOMINANCE IS DROPPING. BITCOIN IS ABOUT TO EXPLODE! pic.twitter.com/nB3j7jp2WU — Ash Crypto (@Ashcryptoreal) March 20, 2025 A TradingView analysis supports this idea, showing that previous declines in USDT dominance were followed by Bitcoin price increases. Per a recent report, experts predict Bitcoin could reach $250,000 over the next year, citing similar accumulation patterns in past market cycles. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 What’s Next for Bitcoin? If USDT dominance continues to fall, Bitcoin could be on the brink of a significant price movement. However, other factors, such as macroeconomic trends, ETF inflows, and regulatory developments, could also play a role. Ash Crypto’s observation of falling USDT dominance aligns with historical indicators of a Bitcoin rally. While no prediction is guaranteed, the market conditions suggest a strong possibility of BTC heading toward a bullish breakout. Investors should stay informed and prepare for potential volatility ahead. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. The views expressed in this article may include the author’s personal opinions and do not represent Times Tabloid’s opinion. Readers are urged to do in-depth research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. title: Digital Asset Summit 2025: Institutional Investors Eye Trump’s Crypto Vision
body: The post Digital Asset Summit 2025: Institutional Investors Eye Trump’s Crypto Vision appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News The three-day Digital Asset Summit 2025 began on March 18 at Javits Center North in New York. The summit has hosted at least 150 speakers and 1,800 attendees. At least 750 institutions have participated in the event, which has conducted around 45 content sessions. Today, the third day of the session, is very crucial, as the summit will host one of its most prominent speakers, US President Donald Trump. Renowned journalist Eleanor Terrett , in an X post, reveals that Trump will send a recording to the DAS conference, dismissing rumours that the president will physically attend the event. Why Is Trump’s Address Crucial? Trump’s scheduled address at the summit is crucial for many reasons. Primarily, it is the first time a sitting US president is addressing the Digital Asset Summit. Secondly, it is doubtful whether the White House Crypto Summit , hosted last month, achieved the desired outcome. The New York summit will provide an opportunity for the Trump administration to explain its stance on the cryptocurrency industry and its pro-crypto policies, like the proposed establishment of a national strategic crypto reserve . Recently, while speaking at the summit, Bo Hines, the Executive Director of the White House’s Council of Advisers on Digital Assets, explained how Trump’s decision to create a strategic crypto reserve would benefit the people of America. Potential Crypto Market Impact of Trump’s Speech The US government’s attitude towards the crypto industry shifted in its favour when Trump emerged victorious in the US presidential election. The Trump administration has already introduced several policies to support the crypto industry. Trump’s speech at the summit could give more clarity about the government’s stance on the cryptocurrency industry. Providing clarity about the crypto policy is pertinent to encourage more institutional investors to enter the crypto market. Crypto’s Future & Market Growth The previous administration adopted an unfavourable approach towards the crypto industry. During the Biden regime, the US SEC launched legal actions against top crypto firms, including Ripple and Coinbase. The shift in the political approach has already benefited the cryptocurrency sector. It is evident from how the Bitcoin market has grown since November 5, 2024. The SEC has dropped some of its sensational legal battles against the industry – including the one against Coinbase . The pro-crypto policies adopted by the Trump administration are expected to support the crypto industry in growing further. Many crypto enthusiasts believe that this is the beginning of a new golden era for digital assets. .article_register_shortcode { padding: 18px 24px; border-radius: 8px; display: flex; align-items: center; margin: 6px 0 22px; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1) 0%, rgba(0, 82, 204, 0.1) 100%); } .article_register_shortcode .media-body h5 { color: #000000; font-weight: 600; font-size: 20px; line-height: 22px; text-align:left; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body h5 span { color: #0052CC; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body p { font-weight: 400; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22px; color: #171717B2; margin-top: 4px; text-align:left; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body{ padding-right: 14px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-button a { float: right; } .article_register_shortcode .primary-button img{ vertical-align: middle; width: 20px; margin: 0; display: inline-block; } @media (min-width: 581px) and (max-width: 991px) { .article_register_shortcode .media-body p { margin-bottom: 0; } } @media (max-width: 580px) { .article_register_shortcode { display: block; padding: 20px; } .article_register_shortcode img { max-width: 50px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body h5 { font-size: 16px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body { margin-left: 0px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-body p { font-size: 13px; line-height: 20px; margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 14px; } .article_register_shortcode .media-button a { float: unset; } .article_register_shortcode .secondary-button { margin-bottom: 0; } } Never Miss a Beat in the Crypto World!
